name: QuickJapanese
0:
”Alexa, open Quick Japanese”
”Alexa, start Quick Japanese”
”Alexa, run Quick Japanese”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quick japanese
des: Want to practice your Japanese? Need a quick translation? This skill is simple, fast and can translate entire phrases! Just open the skill, speak a word or phrase in English, and Alexa will say it back to you in Japanese. It's easy! Translations by Google.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
